mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (userid, productCode, cartAmount, finalPrice) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productCode}, #{cartAmount}, #{finalPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartCode, c.userid, c.productCode, c.cartAmount, (p.price * c.cartAmount) AS finalPrice, p.productName, p.mainImage, p.price, p.capacity FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.productCode = p.productCode WHERE c.userid = #{userId};
